name: LibreSpeed
short_description: Self-hosted speed test tool for bandwidth measurement.
description: Self-hosted speed test tool for bandwidth measurement. LibreSpeed is a self-hosted application focused on network, tools, utility, speedtest. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose. It supports a wide range of use cases for homelabs and self-hosted infrastructure.
usecases: Self-host LibreSpeed on your home server to self-hosted speed test tool for bandwidth measurement without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use LibreSpeed to manage your network workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
